## NVD3 Plot Inline

```{r nvd3plot, results = 'asis', comment = NA, message = F, echo = F}
require(rCharts)
mass <- c(1, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60)
rate <- c(0.126, 0.122, 0.108, 0.085, 0.057, 0.027, 0.003)
d <- data.frame(mass=mass, rate=rate)
n1 <- dPlot(rate ~ mass, data = d, type = 'bubble')
n1$show('inline')

```
